text: Ojo kase, ki ʙunjoni [kori] xesro ʙar pojai parhezgori va xusnudii Alloh taolo ʙino nihoda,ʙehtar ast jo kase, ki ʙunjoni xesro ʙar laʙi partgohi fururextanie ʙino nihodaast va ʙo on dar otasi duzax sarnagun megardad? Va Alloh taolo guruhi sitamgoronro [ʙa saʙaʙi kufru nifoqason] hidojat namekunad
